['\xa0 - trình độ học vấn: đại học, chuyên ngành công nghệ phần mềm/hệ thống/system\xa0- có kinh nghiệp security hệ thống trên môi trường cloud: aws, gcp, k8s ..\xa0\xa0- có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm vị trí devsecops.\xa0- có ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm vị trí devops.\xa0- có kinh nghiệm sử dụng: sonarlint, sonarqube, prisma cloud ...\xa0- có kinh nghiệm sử dụng, tích hợp các công cụ: gitlab, gitlab-runner, jenskin, jira ...\xa0\xa0- khả năng sử dụng nhiều loại công nghệ nguồn mở và dịch vụ đám mây, mô hình microservice ( kubernetes-k8s là một điểm cộng)\xa0- có trách nhiệm và tính cẩn thận trong công việc..\xa0- ưu tiên có kiến thức liên quan tới các hệ thống máy chủ, lưu trữ, sao lưu và các giải pháp quản trị hệ thống linux/unix, hệ thống xác thực, firewall.\xa0- khả năng làm việc phối hợp nhóm.\xa0- tính cách trung thực, có tinh thần trách nhiệm, chịu áp lực tốt.\xa0- tỉ mỉ, cẩn thận trong công việc.\xa0- đam mê học hỏi và tìm hiểu công nghệ.\xa0- đọc/hiểu tốt tiếng anh chuyên ngành.']

['• kiến thức về lập trình, cấu trúc dữ liệu & giải thuật• kiến thức và kỹ năng sử dụng các loại cơ sở dữ liệu (rdbms, graph, databases, nosql, ...)• kiến thức về lập trình lưu trữ, xử lý dữ liệu phân tán, xử lý dữ liệu lớn (spark, kafka, elastic search, redis,...)• kiến thức về xây dựng luồng xử lý dữ liệu (batch processing, stream processing, ...)• kỹ năng làm việc với storage như s3,...• kỹ năng sử dụng ngôn ngữ lập trình (java, python, ...)• hiểu biết vững về vòng đời phát triển phần mềm (sdlc), là một quy trình tiêu chuẩn để thiết kế ứng dụng.']

['about the role', 'does the software work the way it was designed to do? as a qa engineer, you will be laser-focused on doing what is needed to find defects before they go into the delivered product. to support that work, creating and maintaining the tools and environments needed is essential. there is constant focus on improving the way the software is developed and any processes that are not optimal in relation to quality.', 'you will work across teams and support and guide the engineering teams by providing structure on what tests, infrastructure and planning is needed. quality is second nature to you, and you pride yourself on seeing the quality aspect in every context. as a true qa nerd, you possess strong skills within testing and quality, and you readily share your insights (and qa jokes) with your team.', 'you have the mindset of knowing that everything can fail paired with a deep desire to figure out all the edge cases that can trigger a failure. the qa engineer is a key part of helping the product team to be confident in what is being built works as designed. being able to give pertinent feedback is mandatory in this role.', 'what will you do?', 'we are looking for you if you:', 'work with the engineering circle on making sure that released software is of high quality and identify defects in the software before it is released to the user', 'work with the quality assurance engineer in denmark to make sure the foundation for testing is in place', 'have at least 3 years of experience in a qa engineer role – or alternatively, a proven ability to execute and make things happen', 'are a process-oriented person with a deep desire to identify defects in software', 'have the mindset of automating, both in the qa process and your work', 'have the mindset that everything can fail paired with a deep desire to figure out all the edge cases that can trigger a failure', 'always have an overview and a plan', 'have great communication skills that enable you to contribute with incisive and constructive input', 'can plan and structure your own day', 'thrive in a hands-on role where you are an individual contributor', 'preferably have azure certifications', 'are curious and want to learn, grow, and succeed – both as an individual and as part of a team', 'have a strong analytical sense for applying new technologies and solution designs', 'knowledge of working with databases in general not just application databases', 'knowledge and experience with working with rest api and api’s in general', 'speak and write english well']

['about the role', 'the timextender team in hanoi will be the first team of developers in timextender that will be centered around ai and using ai as a key element in the solution, with focus on llms at first.', 'as a developer, you will play a key part in building the software that is behind the timextender product that leverages artificial intelligence technologies. you will be designing, developing, and deploying ai-powered software solutions in collaboration with cross-functional teams. a part of this is also to conduct research and experimentation to explore new ai technologies and stay up-to-date with industry trends.', 'you will work closely together with fellow xpeople from the engineering circle, who work in 4 modules on the development of timextender® on finding the best technical solutions to solve the business needs. this involves also being a part of making technical decisions and being a strong voice within the development circle.', 'your knowledge spans beyond your specialization, and you have a deep understanding not just of technology, but the ecosystem it exists in. this knowledge enables you to see your work as part of a bigger context, and you are always updated on any changes in the industry.', 'the timextender product consists of a windows client application, a server component and a saas web portal. the software is used for managing and building data estates where the data can either be on-prem databases or cloud databases or services. the product integrates with various services through api’s and also through so-called data source connectors that allow the user to ingest raw data into the product.', 'we are looking for you if you:', 'will be advance if you:', 'have at least 5 years of experience as a software developer', 'are experienced with building high quality client/server software components in .net and c# that are used for various on-prem services/databases or cloud services through api’s', 'are experienced and have skills and insights into integration with databases, sql-server, t-sql and working with data in general', 'have solid understanding of core api concepts', 'have knowledge and experience of working with rest api and api’s in general', 'have a strong analytical sense for applying new technologies and solution designs', 'have great communication skills and ability to pass on knowledge', 'have a growth-oriented mindset with the ability to see through solutions when identifying problems and seeing learning and improvement as key factors for success', 'are focused on getting things done with a proactive attitude', 'are curious and constantly seek out new knowledge', 'can plan and structure your own day', 'speak and write english well and have collborated successfully with english speaking remote teams on different time zones.', 'have solid experience and insights with using ai and llms to build software products', 'have some years of experience working as a lead software developer', 'can provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members, fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation.']

['requirements:', 'requirements:', 'bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field.', 'proven experience working as a backend developer, preferably with golang.', 'strong knowledge and understanding of server-side development concepts, patterns, and best practices.', '\xa0proficient in golang programming language and its ecosystem, with a solid understanding of core language concepts and standard library.', '\xa0experience with developing restful apis and microservices architectures.', 'familiarity with database systems such as postgresql, mysql, or mongodb.', 'knowledge of containerization technologies like docker and container orchestration platforms like kubernetes is a plus.', 'familiarity with devops practices and tools for continuous integration and deployment is a plus.', 'ability to work effectively both independently and in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.', '\xa0excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze and resolve complex technical issues.', 'strong communication skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.']

['bachelor’s degree in computer programming, computer science, or a related field.', 'you will be part of the team building the web portal framework – which integrates with into the main business system – with members both in sweden, united kingdom and vietnam. together you will discuss architectural design, extend the framework functionality as well as build web applications using the framework. the framework brings a server-heavy approach to building web applications; hence the primary programming languages being kotlin and java. the client side of the application is built in react, using redux and microfrontends. knowledge and experience of these is a bonus, as is experience with angular.', 'the team is warm and welcoming. they like to engage in architectural design discussions and have the ambition of building a phenomenal and unique web application framework - all the while having fun along the way. the framework has been under development for a few years, which means that the project is quite well underway but at the same time it is small enough so that it is graspable for newcomers. there’s a lot of room for creativity, solution design and teamwork.', 'key responsibilities', '\xa0', 'if you are passionate about front-end development and have a strong understanding of web development principles, we would love to hear from you.', 'develop and maintain user-friendly, responsive web applications using html, css, and javascript.', 'collaborate with designers and back-end developers to ensure seamless integration of user interface elements with server-side logic.', 'implement and maintain web design principles such as accessibility, responsiveness, and cross-browser compatibility.', 'ensure code quality through testing and debugging processes.', 'continuously research and implement new web technologies to improve the performance and user experience of web applications.', 'work with product owners and project managers to ensure project deadlines are met.', 'bachelor’s degree in computer programming, computer science, or a related field.', 'a minimum of 3 years of experience in front-end development or related field.', 'strong understanding of web development principles such as html, css, and javascript.', 'experience working with frameworks such as react.', 'knowledge of version control systems such as git.', 'strong problem-solving and debugging skills.', 'excellent communication and collaboration skills.']

['you will be part of the team building the web portal framework – which integrates with into the main business system – with members both in sweden, united kingdom and vietnam. together you will discuss architectural design, extend the framework functionality as well as build web applications using the framework. the framework brings a server-heavy approach to building web applications; hence the primary programming languages being kotlin and java. the client side of the application is built in react, using redux and microfrontends. knowledge and experience of these is a bonus, as is experience with angular.', 'the team is warm and welcoming. they like to engage in architectural design discussions and have the ambition of building a phenomenal and unique web application framework - all the while having fun along the way. the framework has been under development for a few years, which means that the project is quite well underway but at the same time it is small enough so that it is graspable for newcomers. there’s a lot of room for creativity, solution design and teamwork.', 'key responsibilities', '\xa0', 'design and develop intuitive, user-centered interfaces for web applications.', 'create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs based on user requirements and design guidelines.', 'conduct user research and usability testing to gather insights and optimize user experiences.', 'collaborate closely with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and translate them into design solutions.', 'ensure the design and implementation align with brand guidelines, accessibility standards, and best practices for responsive design.', 'use html, css, javascript, and other relevant technologies to implement and maintain front-end designs and interactions.', 'stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and design best practices to continuously enhance skills and drive innovation.', 'use version control systems, specifically git, to manage code repositories and collaborate effectively with development teams.', 'proven experience as a ux designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful projects and a deep understanding of user-centered design principles.', 'experience\xa0in coding with react and/or angular, html, css, responsive design, javascript and git.', 'strong knowledge of ux design tools such as sketch, adobe xd, figma, or similar is beneficial.', 'familiarity with front-end development frameworks and libraries.', 'excellent understanding of cross-browser compatibility, accessibility standards, and responsive design principles.', 'ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and communicate design concepts and ideas clearly.', 'excellent communication and collaboration skills.']

['you have at least 5 years of professional experience using java stack', 'you have professional experience developing web applications using react or angular', 'you understand the value of testing and practice test driven development to deliver high quality software', 'you have experience using automated testing frameworks like jest, cypress, selenium', 'you have professional experience with cloud (aws, gcp or azure) and containerisation technologies (docker, kubernetes)\xa0', 'you understand the value of devops practices and can apply them in the software development lifecycle (jenkins, ci/cd, github actions, gitlab ci, azure devops etc)', 'you have professional experience working in an agile development environment and ideally have scrum certification (e.g. scrum developer, scrum master)', 'you can contribute to technical decisions based on your expertise and client requirements', 'you have a degree in computer science or an equivalent related field (bachelor / master)', 'you are a strong communicator in english and can confidently collaborate with technical and business stakeholders']

["you're a highly seasoned and skilled java developer. you want to be part of an adventure and build a company to be proud of together with your fellow adventurers. you understand that good teamwork is the way to achieve great results. a bonus is if you're a football fan!", 'must have:s', 'nice to have:s', 'other traits we love', '5+ years of experience in java web services (rest, soap), very proficient in java core and experienced in design patterns.', 'strong experience in spring boot and spring framework applications development and testing.', 'deep knowledge of database programming and design – both relational and nosql: mysql, mongodb, redis.', 'experience of kafka and vertx.', 'good at unit tests, code reviews, etc.', 'knowledge in amazon web services (aws), linux os (ubuntu, centos) and docker.', 'experience of performance analysis and systems monitoring.', "take a lot of initiative and help out wherever it's needed.", 'speak and write english and vietnamese.', 'knowledge of javascript, html, css, wordpress development.', 'experience in vuejs, devops is a plus.', 'people who enjoy a startup environment.\xa0', 'great communicators that keep our team up to date with the progress.\xa0', "people who are not afraid of asking for help - and giving it! we're a team!\xa0", 'people who are \xa0experienced in agile methodologies (scrum/kanban).\xa0', 'people with a great sense of humor! to work hard, we also need to have some fun.']

['experienced in developing software applications (backend & frontend).', 'extensive knowledge of angular, typescript.', 'extensive knowledge of c# and .net core framework.', 'strong interpersonal and communication skills and ability to work in a team-based environment.', 'strong attention to detail.', 'able to understand english', 'continuously driven to learn new programming languages and software-related technologies']

['- kinh nghiệm lập trình unity: từ 6 tháng. chấp nhận các dev có kinh nghiệm từ 1.5 năm chuyển ngang sang unity.- tư duy hệ thống tốt, ham học hỏi, có khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm tốt- lợi thế với:+ ứng viên có sẵn sản phẩm demo liên quan hoặc là source code trên git+ ứng viên có từng áp dụng kỹ thuật lập trình hướng đối tượng, cấu trúc dữ liệu và giải thuật+ ứng viên đã áp dụng các kỹ thuật lập trình theo các design pattern kinh điển+ ứng viên tốt nghiệp đúng các chuyên ngành: như cntt, toán tin, điện tử viễn thông, tự động hóa,...+ ứng viên tốt nghiệp các trường kỹ thuật như: đh bkhn, đhqg, gtvt, bưu chính, đh công nghiệp, fpt,…']

['yêu cầu chung:- tốt nghiệp đh chuyên ngành cntt và đtvt hoặc tương đương, có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm.- đam mê công nghệ, năm vững ngôn ngữ java, oop- có kiến thức làm việc với javascript, jquery, html/css, kiến thức cơ bản spring boot, spring mvc, spring security,… \xa0 \xa0\xa0- có kinh nghiệm với csdl như mysql , oracle…có kinh nghiệm phát triển web service ( restful apis, json/xml).- có tư duy logic khả năng xử lý tình huống tốt, cẩn thận, trách nhiệm cao trong công việc.- có khả năng làm việc độc lập, làm việc nhóm.có thể đọc hiểu tài liệu tiếng anh là một lợi thế.- ưu tiên ứng viên hiểu biết về angular.- sử dụng công cụ quản lý mã nguồn git. sẵn sàng học tập các ngôn ngữ, framework mới.', 'kỹ năng mềm:- kỹ năng làm việc nhóm hiệu quả, kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề- trung thực, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao, chủ động sáng tạo trong công việc.']

column89: ['- tốt nghiệp các trường: đại học bách khoa, hv công nghệ bưu chính viễn thông, hv kỹ thuật mật mã, đại học quốc gia....chuyên ngành cntt, điện tử viễn thông, khoa học máy tính....và các chuyên ngành liên quan khác.', '- có kinh nghiệm lập trình bằng java từ 3 trở lên;', '- đã từng làm việc với java core và các framework thông dụng (jsf, springboot);', '- có hiểu biết các hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu: mysql, mariadb, sqlite, sql server hoặc oracle;', '- biết sử dụng git để quản lý source code;', '- có kinh nghiệm làm việc trên hdh linux (centos/redhat) ;', '- nắm vững lập trình hướng đối tượng oop;', '- có hiểu biết về web services (json, xml);', 'ưu tiên :', '- có hiểu biết hoặc đã từng lập trình mobile app, angular, reactjs ;', '- có kinh nghiệm về devops\xa0', '- có kinh nghiệm quản lý team ;', '- có khả năng đọc hiểu tiếng anh chuyên ngành;', '- tư duy logic tốt, học hỏi nhanh;', '- có khả năng tự nghiên cứu, phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề.']
